## Description Data
```{r data}
rents <- read.csv('kc_house_data.csv')
str(rents)
```

```{r geo, echo=FALSE}
qpal <-  colorQuantile(palette = 'GnBu', domain = rents$price, n = 9)
rent.map <- leaflet(rents) %>% 
  addProviderTiles("CartoDB.Positron") %>% 
  addCircleMarkers(lng = ~long, lat = ~lat, 
                   stroke = FALSE, 
                   fillOpacity = 5, 
                   color = ~qpal(price), 
                   radius = 5,
                   label = ~as.character(paste0('Price: ', price, ", ", 'condition: ', condition, ", ", 'year built: ', yr_built))) %>%
  addLegend('bottomright', pal = qpal, values = ~price, opacity = 1, title = 'Price Quantiles') #labFormat = labelFormat(prefix = '$')

rent.map
```
